Description:
Equipment Operated: Diagnostic and medical equipment related to specialty.
Licensure: Registered Medical Doctor under Consultant Category
Languages: Proficiency both in English and Arabic is preferred.
Personal Requirement: Possess integrity, initiative, and evidence of good health and grooming, good moral character and right conduct, strong and pleasing personality.
Job Requirement: Participates actively in organization-wide activities without hesitance or personal reservation. Can adapt to unusual job-related circumstances. Works effectively under stressful condition. Willing to work extended hours to attend to emergency cases.
Travel: Willing and fit to travel for business purposes such as: going to other branches to introduce a new system, training abroad.Job Details
